full_text:
MARATHONS – ENDURANCE CONTESTS AND EXHIBITIONS.

	No person shall conduct carry on or participate in any marathon dance contest or exhibition or any walkathon or walking contest or exhibition, or any tree sitting, pole sitting, or platform endurance contest or exhibition, or any contest or exhibition in which any human being is buried or concealed underground, or any other endurance contest or exhibition of a nature similar to any contest or exhibition enumerated herein.

	See CR A 1303.

8.catch_line: Tenant Relocation Assistance Where Mobilehome Parks Are Changed To A Different Use.

11.catch_line: Display Of Aerosol Spray Paint Containers And Marker Pens.

12.catch_line: Excessive Price Increases During State Of Emergency.

14.catch_line: Self Service Display Of Tobacco Products.

15.catch_line: Spectators Prohibited At Speed Contests And Exhibitions Of Speed.

16.catch_line: Display And Sale Of Glass Etching Products.

17.catch_line: Sale Of Motor-Driven Cycles And Motorized Bicycles.

Narcotics, Violent Crime, Unlawful Weapon Or Ammunition
Crime, And Gang-Related Crime Eviction Program.

plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE

MARATHONS – ENDURANCE CONTESTS AND EXHIBITIONS. (§ 47.02)

  MARATHONS – ENDURANCE CONTESTS AND EXHIBITIONS.	No person shall conduct
carry on or participate in any marathon dance contest or exhibition or any
walkathon or walking contest or exhibition, or any tree sitting, pole sitting,
or platform endurance contest or exhibition, or any contest or exhibition in
which any human being is buried or concealed underground, or any other endurance
contest or exhibition of a nature similar to any contest or exhibition
enumerated herein.	See CR A 1303.

MARATHONS – ENDURANCE CONTESTS AND EXHIBITIONS.

No person shall conduct carry on or participate in any marathon dance contest or exhibition or any walkathon or walking contest or exhibition, or any tree sitting, pole sitting, or platform endurance contest or exhibition, or any contest or exhibition in which any human being is buried or concealed underground, or any other endurance contest or exhibition of a nature similar to any contest or exhibition enumerated herein.

See CR A 1303.
